name: EMOTECH
description:
Cyberpunk future wherein Big Pharma has gained control over emotions through a hit new drug. You are interviewing for a position in one such company and must navigate a subjects neural mycelium in order to give them the right percentage of happiness...

Arrow Keys to move

Press B for Bomb

Scroll Wheel and Right Click to look at documents

Global Game Jam 2023 Submisssion

Benjamin Quinlan  - Programming

Matthew Cunningham - Sound and Programming

Lauren Keogh - Art
